Parameter.description: (Optional) Limit an event when show from each page

title: GET /event/category_lists/:lang
description: List an event that is not empty
name: GetEventCategory

Parameter.description: Language like en, th. Default is en

title: GET /event/category_set/:category_id
description: Get event from category on today and in range
name: GetEventCategorySet

Parameter.description: Language like en, th. Default is en
[Optional] Limit event to display. Default is 20
Any word that you want to search
Something where are you get this event from
Language like en, th. Default is en
Set to 0 for disable, set to 1 to enable
Type of log e.g. event, comment, picture
Log state e.g. add, view, edit, share
Id of an event, comment or picture
(Optional) Message when share an event to facebook

Header.description: (Optional) User Access Token if register from guest

Parameter.description: Your username using for login to system

title: POST /sniff/location
description: Get an event from lat,lng and filter with category
name: PostSniffLocation

Parameter.description: Category in an array to filter but if you want to show all categroy send it to String with 'all'
Lat,Lng from map with South-West and North-East
Language like en, th. Default is en

title: GET /user/event/pictures/:user_id
description: Get pictures in each event from user
name: GetUserEventPicture

title: GET /user/event/past/:user_id
description: Get event that user was sniff in the past
name: GetUserPastEvent

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
    "show_facebook": false,
    "show_email": true,
    "show_birth_date": true,
    "show_gender": true,
    "show_website": true,
    "show_mobile": false,
    "notify_update": true,
    "notify_message": true
}

Parameter.description: Tell method which part do you want to update (picture, display_name, detail)
Anything you want to add (maximum at 150 character)

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
picture=base64_encode
display_name=Test Name
detail=Test to update detail
gender=male
birth_date=2012-01-26
username=p2user
email=p2mail@gmail.com
password=1234
new_password=111111
confirm_password=111111
website=http://google.com
phone=0888475124
fb_name=Cartman

Parameter.description: Allow for facebook, website, phone, gender, birth
